attributes.title: ☠️💀SCARY APP BEWARE💀☠️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my öråńgę president, but I gotta say, donny boy, your app sucks🍑. If you can’t even make a ‘great’ app, how are you supposed to make America great again.

attributes.title: Please don’t get! Save yourself!!!
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to support my fellow Cheeto 😌✌️ AND IT STARTED ASKING SO MUCH INFO ABOUT ME. it even asked my zip code!!! But of course I had to put trust in my love. I started getting awful emails and attacked with texts, emails, and even letters!! They were threatening me and gave my sister pink eye. I just don’t think anyone should have to go through that so turn back now.

attributes.title: no 💖
attributes.review: Ok so I wanted to see what all the white supremacists we’re talking and find the truth about our fellow Cheeto Puff (I think he’s the president) so I downloaded the app. I first noticed that is was restricted to ages 16 and below, and obviously I’m 18 but that means Donald Trump really isn’t for everyone, this is very disappointing as we need to educated our younger generation. I opened the app and it was requiring me to have messages sent to me from a random email and phone number that i didn’t know, and I figured it was going to be spam mail but i decided to give the app a chance and finish my profile. Next thing I noticed was at first the app was working great, it was smooth and fast but then a bunch of viruses and bugs started coming onto my brand new iPhone 11 Pro Max and it was very disappointing. I proceeded to take my iPhone 11 Pro Max to the apple store which costs as much as getting a brand new iPhone 11 Pro Max to fix, but i did it anyway. After all this I still wanted to give the app a chance so I went back on the app and noticed that I could check in with the family members of the White House so of course I wanted to check on my boy Barron but i noticed it’s like he didn’t even exist! Very upsetting! This app got on my last straw as it asked me to campaign for Donald by going door to door. After going to the last rally I got Corona so I can’t go door to door anymore although they are are spamming me with emails and messages persisting I do. Very annoying! Keep in mind I am not a troll and I wanted to give this terrible app a chance but it failed the average standards and made me spend tons of money. Very disappointing Mr.President do better.

attributes.title: This got me sick
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be able to keep up with the great overlord Cheeto. Everything was fine until I went to the shop. I wanted to buy 100000000 straws for all of the the mini trumpies but the app would not allow me. I was immensely disappointed and deleted the app. This app also made me get corona. -10000/10 don’t recommend.

Much hate love, I hate you so much!!💋💋🤍

attributes.title: 🔥THIS APP WILL TRACK YOUR LOCATIONS🔥
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I read the full user agreement. I was surprised when it said "we will have access to your location even when the app is not running" it also said "we might send this and other information to a third party manager". THE AUDACITY. I immediately told my best friend Carole. And she had a HEART ATTACK. I loved her sweet potatoe pies. May she rest in peace oh lawd. In conclusion this app tracks your location and gives off information to third party users. This app also caused Carole to have a heart attack. Bye bye Cheeto man 👋

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: Downloading this app was honestly a rollercoaster.The second I downloaded it my phone contracted 3 viruses that took extremely long to remove.if I could give this app a 0 I would
